/usr/local/cuda-12.8/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --generate-code=arch=compute_75,code=[compute_75,sm_75] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/JobShopScheduler.dir/src/JobShopHeuristic.cpp.o CMakeFiles/JobShopScheduler.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/JobShopScheduler.dir/src/NeuralNetwork.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/JobShopScheduler.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda-12.8/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-12.8/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
